name: Ocean Mothership
description:
Ocean Mothership is a 2D platformer game.

In this game you the scuba diving hero who needs to destroy the evil mothership that landed in our ocean to destroy our world.

Play using AWSD commands.

I changed the below items to make this game different from the class game.

Player has a snorkel

Music and sound effects were created by me

Added Ocean background before the first level and after the end of the second level.

Changes to the menus:

  • Backgrounds
  • Buttons
